title: The description and use of a joynt-rule fitted with lines for the finding the hour of the day and azimuth of the sun, to any particular latitude, or, to apply the same generally to any latitude : together with all the uses of Gunters quadrant applyed thereunto ... / contriv'd & written by J. Brown, philomath.
author: Brown, John, philomath.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by T.J. for J. Brown and H. Sutton, and sold at their houses,
